info.title: Imentiv API
info.description:
Imentiv API - Understand the emotions in your images with Imentiv AI.
Discover the emotional makeup of your image with our advanced AI

get.description: Get audio summary based on audio_id

put.description: Update or clear the summary for a specific audio file

get.description: Retrieve Single Audio based on audio_id.

delete.description: Delete the processed details of an audio file by its unique audio ID.

put.description: Reprocess an audio file based on audio id.

default.description: Set to 'True' to reprocess an already completed audio; defaults to 'False'.

put.summary: Edit Title And Description By Id
put.description: Edit the title and desciption of an audio  based on the provided audio ID.
Update the name of a specific speaker within an audio document.

delete.description: Delete a specific segment within an audio document.

put.description: Update transcripts and timestamps for a specific video.

get.description: API to get audios processed by user.

post.description: API for uploading an audio for emotion analysis.

get.description: Get a unique frame details based on video_id and frame_id
Retrieve Dominant Emotion for a Specific Frame
Retrieve Emotion Intensity for a Specific Frame

put.description: Update the emotion of a specific face in a frame

get.description: API to Retrieve Frames of the video based on video_id.

put.description: Update Face ID in multiple frames of a video

default.description: (Required) The new face ID to replace with.

get.description: Get the highlight video url of the video based on video_id.

put.description: Update the highlight video

get.description: Get summary of a video based on video_id

put.description: Update or clear the summary for a specific video file.

post.description: Add a note to a frame in a video

put.description: Edit the note for a frame in a video

get.description: Download the annotated frame

delete.description: Deletes a specified face from the video without deleting the video itself.

put.description: Updates the name of a specific face in a video.

default.description: (Required) The new name for the face.

put.description: Merges multiple faces from a video into a selected face to remove duplicates

default.description: (Required) A comma-separated list of unique face IDs of the faces in the video to be merged.

get.description: Get the personality traits of a video

post.description: Processes video to extract and analyze personality traits using machine learning models

default.description: (Required) The callback url to notify personality processing is completed. Give a valid URL.

get.description: Download a videos's processed analysis details based on the provided video ID.

post.description:
Initiates the generation of an analysis report for the specified video. 
The user will be notified at the provided callback URL once the process is complete.

default.description: (Required) The callback url to notify once analysis report is generated. Give a valid URL.

get.description: Get a single video details by ID

delete.description: Delete an video's processed details and its frames subcollection based on the provided video ID.

put.description: Reprocesses a multimodal video with a failed or completed status

default.description: Set to 'True' to reprocess an already completed video; defaults to 'False'.

get.description: Download the highlight video.
Download the annotated video
Get emotion intensities of a video based on video_id
Calculates and stores the average emotion data for a video

put.summary: Edit Title And Description By Id
put.description: Edit the title and desciption of an video  based on the provided audio ID.
Request a psychologist's review for the analysis details based on the provided video ID.

get.description: API to get videos processed by user

post.description: API to Upload Video for emotion analysis
API endpoint for highlight generation of a video.

default.description: (Required) The unique video ID of the video for which the highlight to be generated.

get.description: Get a single image details by ID

delete.description: Delete an image's processed details and its `notes` subcollection based on the provided image ID.

put.description: Reprocesses an image with a failed or completed status

default.description: Set to 'True' to reprocess an already completed image; defaults to 'False'.

get.description: API to download the annotated image

put.summary: Edit Title And Description By Id
put.description: Edit the title and description of an image based on the provided image ID.

get.description: Download a image's processed analysis details based on the provided image ID.
Retrieve the status,id of images uploaded by user.

post.description: The API to Upload Image for emotion analysis

get.description: Get a single text processed details based on text id.

delete.description: Delete a text's processed details based on the provided text ID.

put.description: Reprocess a text file based on text id.

default.description: Set to 'True' to reprocess an already processed text; defaults to 'False'.

put.description: Reprocess the emotions and keywords for a given text based on its ID.

default.description: (Required) The URL to notify when the processing is complete.

get.description: Download a text's processed analysis details based on the provided text ID.
API to get all texts processed by user.

post.description: API for uploading an text for emotion analysis.

default.description: Optional identifier for bulk uploads. If you are performing a bulk operation, provide the unique ID associated with that bulk upload.

get.description: API to download bulk upload csv

put.description: API to reprocess bulk upload media if specific media is failed

default.description: (Required) The type of the media to reprocess.

put.description: API to update bulk upload status

default.description: (Required) The status of the bulk upload. It can be PROCESS, PAUSE, CANCEL and RESUME.

post.description: API for generating an API key for users who log in for the first time.

default.description: (Required) The feature of the project. For example 'audience_panel'
